CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst College relative to Luminara Academy?
SRP.A: Starburst College is {below} Luminara Academy in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara Academy relative to Starburst College?
SRP.A: Luminara Academy is {above} Starburst College in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total publication count?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Luminara Academy}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total publication count?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starburst College}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starburst College's minimum Publication Count in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starburst College's minimum Publication Count is in {1990}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starburst College's maximum Publication Count in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starburst College's maximum Publication Count is in {1966}.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1983, was the average total Publication Count higher or lower than between 1976 and 1988?
NC.A: The average total publication count between 1980 and 1983 was {higher} than between 1976 and 1988.

NC.Q: Between 1989 and 1990, did the total Publication Count experience a larger or smaller change than between 1988 and 1993?
NC.A: The change in total publication count between 1989 and 1990 was {larger} than between 1988 and 1993.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1988, was the average total Publication Count higher or lower than between 1968 and 1971?
NC.A: The average total publication count between 1975 and 1988 was {lower} than between 1968 and 1971.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1985, did the total Publication Count experience a larger or smaller change than between 1973 and 1983?
NC.A: The change in total publication count between 1976 and 1985 was {larger} than between 1973 and 1983.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Luminara Academy} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Starburst College and Luminara Academy first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Starburst College and Luminara Academy did not exchange leading positions.
